SyncPattern.Name: Artist\Album\Track
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern places the tracks the same way iTunes places tracks in a managed iTunes music folder. Files are organized by Artist\Album\TrackNumber Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Artist\Album\Track (with disc number)
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern places the tracks the same way iTunes places tracks in a managed iTunes music folder. Files are organized by Artist\Album\DiscNumber-TrackNumber Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Artist\Track
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes the tracks in folders named by Artist and album. Files are organized like this: Artist - Album\TrackNumber Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Artist\Track (with disc number)
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes the tracks in folders named by Artist and album. Files are organized like this: Artist - Album\DiscNumber-TrackNumber Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Artist - Track
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes all tracks in the root media folder of the device. All tracks from all artists are in one folder and names like this: Artist - Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Playlist
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes the tracks in folders named by playlist. Files are organized like this: Artist - Name.
